Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Lakatula zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa iwe kuchokera m’Bukundipopitirizakupemphera. Ndithudimapemphero amateteza munthu ku machimo ndi zinthu zoipa. Ndithudi kukumbukira Mulungu ndi chinthu chachikulu ndipo Mulungu amadziwa zonse zimene mumachita

Ndipo musatsutsane ndi anthu okhulupirira za m’Buku pokhapokha kutakhala koyenera kutero, kupatula okhawo amene amachita zoipa. Nena, “Ife timakhulupirira mu izo zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa ife ndi zimene zidavumbulutsidwa kwa inu ndipo Mulungu wathu ndi Mulungu wanu ndi mmodzi ndipo ife tadzipereka kwa Iye.”
Ndipokotero Ifetavumbulutsa Bukulolemekezekakwa iwe. Kotero onse amene tawapatsa Buku amakhulupirira mwa ilo ndipo palibe amene amakana chivumbulutso chathu kupatula anthu osalungama
Ndipo iwe siudalakatule za m’Buku lina ili lisanadze. Ndipo iwe siudalembe Buku lina lililonse ndi manja ako. Zikadatero, ndithudi, anthu oyankhula zachabechabe akadakayika
Iyayi! Izi ndi ziphunzitso zomveka zimene zili m’mitima ya iwo amene adapatsidwa nzeru ndipo palibe amene amakana chiphunzitso chathu kupatula wosalungama
Iwo amati, “Bwanji Ambuye wake sadamupatse zizindikiro?” Nena, ” Zizindikiro zonse zili ndi Mulungu ndipo ine ndine mchenjezi chabe.”
Kodi sizidakwanire kuti tavumbulutsa Buku lolemekezeka kwa iwe limene lili kuwerengedwa kwa iwo? Ndithudi m’Bukuli muli chifundo ndi chikumbutso kwa anthu okhulupirira
